oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Southern Serenaders performances - tape 5 - 1949-04-02
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 5 of various performances featuring the Southern Serenaders (performers) and Farmer Jim Neal (host) on April 2 , 1949.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Southern Serenaders; Red Pleasant
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- [Unidentified] introduces Red Pleasant and the Southern Serenaders -- There's A Little But Of Everything In Texas (Southern Serenaders) -- Opening statement (Farmer Jim Neal) -- Boogie In E (Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks about an upcoming show -- Candy Kisses (Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal introduces the next tune -- Biting My Fingernails And Thinking Dear Of You (Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks about an upcoming show and introduces the next tune -- Lovesick Blues (Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks about an upcoming show -- Hillbilly Boogie (Southern Serenaders) -- Farmer Jim Neal talks -- There's A Little Bit Of Everything In Texas (Southern Serenaders) -- Closing statement (Farmer Jim Neal)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Southern Serenaders;
